## vt meta

Returns metadata about VirusTotal

### Synopsis

Returns metadata about VirusTotal.

Metadata includes the full list of engines, relationships supported by each type
of objects, and other useful information.

```
vt meta [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for meta
```

  -v, --verbose         verbose output
